text: Xaq jeriꞌ ri Dios xutaq bꞌik ri achi ri xketzelaj uwach nabꞌe mul, are xkibꞌij che: ¿Jachin xat kojow che taqanel o che qꞌatal tzij pa qawiꞌ? Xa kꞌu are ri Dios xubꞌan taqanel xuqujeꞌ kꞌamal bꞌe che ri Moisés, rech ri utinimit Israel. Are waꞌ ri xubꞌij ri ángel che, are xukꞌut ribꞌ choch pa ri kꞌix.
